name: Reverse Bros.
description:
MENU CONTROLS
Arrows - Move cursor
Z - Select / Confirm
X - Return

IN GAME CONTROLS
Arrows - Walk
Z - Swap character
X - Revert floor tiles (facing)
ESC - Show restart / give up menu

OBJECTIVE
Make way for both characters reach the prize

RULES
White character only walks on black tiles and vice versa;
White character turns black tiles into whites and vice versa;
